      • AddRootOutline

        public Boolean AddRootOutline(String ^label, int dest, float y)
        Adds root node for current PDF document
        Parameters:
        label - A text string which should be shown as the outline title
        dest - Corresponding page number of this outline
        y - The y-coordinate in target page
         
        Returns:
        True if adding success, otherwise false

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • Open

        public PDF_ERROR Open(IRandomAccessStream^ stream, String^ password)
        Open an IRandomAccessStream which is generated from a PDF document
        Parameters:
        stream - A handle to a IRandomAccessStream instance which contains PDF document data
        password - Password for the document if it is encrypted, NULL is it is not
         
        Returns:
        A PDF_ERROR instance with error code, err_ok if the document was openned succesfully.

      • OpenPath

        public PDF_ERROR OpenPath(String^ path, String^ password )
        Open a PDF document with specified path
        Parameters:
        path - A text string which specifies the document file path
        password - Password for the document if it is encrypted, NULL is it is not
         
         
        Returns:
        A PDF_ERROR instance with error code, err_ok if the document was openned succesfully.

      • OpenStream

        public PDF_ERROR OpenStream(PDFStream^ stream, String^ password)
        Open an PDFStream which is generated from a PDF document
        Parameters:
        stream - A handle to a PDFStream instance which contains PDF document data
        password - Password for the document if it is encrypted, NULL is it is not
         
         
        Returns:
        A PDF_ERROR instance with error code, err_ok if the document was openned succesfully.
